intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce their insurance costs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they feel their current insurance costs are too high or are exploring new policies.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's digital tools to showcase cost-saving calculators or simulators.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and embedded tools

intents.sub_intent: understanding key insurance concepts (e.g., 5 P's, 15/30/5 rule)
intents.user_motivation: Users want to make informed decisions by understanding insurance terminology and rules.
intents.search_context: Users search this when comparing policies or trying to decode insurance jargon.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Simplify complex terms with interactive glossaries or explainers.

intents.sub_intent: what to avoid when dealing with insurance adjusters
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid mistakes that could lead to unfavorable claim outcomes.
intents.search_context: Users search this after an incident or when preparing to file a claim.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide trust-building advice that aligns with ING's customer-first approach.

intents.sub_intent: how to choose the best insurance policy
intents.user_motivation: Users want to identify the most suitable insurance policy for their needs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when actively comparing insurance providers.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's expertise in offering tailored financial products.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Comparison table with ING's offerings highlighted

sub_intents: how to save money on insurance premiums
understanding key insurance concepts (e.g., 5 P's, 15/30/5 rule)
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can emphasize its digital tools and transparent pricing to appeal to cost-conscious users.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a comprehensive guide on saving money and understanding insurance basics, supported by ING's tools.

sub_intents: what to avoid when dealing with insurance adjusters
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: Position ING as a trusted advisor in navigating claims processes.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop a claims resource center with practical advice and ING's customer support options.

sub_intents: how to choose the best insurance policy
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: Leverage ING's reputation for tailored financial solutions to stand out in a competitive space.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a decision-making framework that highlights ING's unique policy benefits.

highest_probability_streams: how to save money on insurance premiums
understanding key insurance concepts (e.g., 5 P's, 15/30/5 rule)
how to choose the best insurance policy
quick_wins: Develop a glossary for key insurance terms.
Create a listicle on saving money with actionable tips.
Publish a checklist for dealing with insurance adjusters.
strategic_priorities: Invest in interactive tools like calculators for insurance savings.
Build a comprehensive insurance education hub.
